item.title: Taking cannabis to a music festival
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Haha, I just came back from a music festival and got a story that might help.

Security guards are generally looking for glass when letting you in the campsite. If you keep all your bud either deep down in a bag pocket or actually on your person, you will be fine.

The guys are generally a bit relaxed when it comes to people smoking weed, but it needs to be kept pretty discrete still. Me and a few friends went to a mates tent on the other side of the site to smoke a bit of bud with them. A dick steward walks past during a smoke, spots the grinder, and gets 2-3 sec. guards to come. They say “basically give us all your weed now, you can stay at the festival, and nothing more will be said”. My friends give them a bag of weed and they begin searching, and find 3 more bags of weed and a bag of MDMA. AS SOON AS the class As where found, they radioed in, about 7 undercover police came over and a few of my mates were arrested.

You’ll be able to smoke fine, and as long as everything is pretty much out of site, you’ll be fine to be blazing alll night and all day. enjoy it buddy!

There will be a huge load of pipes and bongs to buy at the fest, but I still reccomend you just bill up some zoooooots
